text: Area code 989 is the area code for northeastern Michigan. It is the highest possible number for an area code, since any number with a 9 in the middle is not allowed to be an area code. It was made in 2001. ==Cities in area== Cities and towns in the 989 area are: * Alma * Alpena * Bad Axe * Bay City * Caro * Clare * Gaylord * Grayling * Houghton Lake * Midland * Mt. Pleasant * Owosso * Saginaw * St. Johns * Tawas City * West Branch ==References== ==Other websites== * Map of Michigan area codes * List of exchanges from AreaCodeDownload.com, 989 Area Code 989 Category:Michigan
title: Area code 989
